task.name: importfits
task.shortdescription: Convert an image FITS file into a CASA image
task.description: Convert an image FITS file into a CASA image

param.name: fitsimage
param.shortdescription: Name of input image FITS file
param.description:
Name of input image FITS file Default: none
Example: fitsimage='3C273XC1.fits'

param.name: imagename
param.description:
Name of output CASA image Default: none
Example: fitsimage='3C273XC1.image'

param.name: whichrep
param.shortdescription: If fits image has multiple coordinate reps, choose one.
param.description:
If fits image has multiple coordinate reps, choose one. Default: 0 (means first)
Example: whichrep=1

param.name: whichhdu
param.shortdescription: If fits file contains multiple images, choose one (0 = first HDU, -1 = first valid image).
param.description:
If fits file contains multiple images, choose one Default: -1 (use the first valid one)
NOTE: 0 = first HDU, -1 = first valid image
Example: whichhdu=1

param.name: zeroblanks
param.shortdescription: Set blanked pixels to zero (not NaN)
param.description: Set blanked pixels to zero (not NaN) Default: True Options: True|False

param.name: overwrite
param.shortdescription: Overwrite output file if it exists?
param.description: Overwrite output file if it exists? Default: False Options: False|True

param.name: defaultaxes
param.shortdescription: Add the default 4D coordinate axes where they are missing; value True requires setting defaultaxesvalues
param.description:
Add the default 4D coordinate axes where they are missing Default: False Options: False|True
IMPORTANT: value True requires setting defaultaxesvalues

param.name: defaultaxesvalues
param.shortdescription: List of values to assign to added degenerate axes when defaultaxes==True (ra,dec,freq,stokes)
param.description:
List of values to assign to added degenerate axes when defaultaxes==True (ra,dec,freq,stokes) Default: []
For existing axes, empty strings can be given as values. For the directions and spectral values, any valid angle/frequency expressions can be given.
Example: defaultaxesvalues=['19h30m00', '-02d30m00', '88.5GHz', 'Q']

param.name: beam
param.shortdescription: List of values to be used to define the synthesized beam [BMAJ,BMIN,BPA] (as in the FITS keywords)
param.description:
List of values to be used to define the synthesized beam [BMAJ,BMIN,BPA] (as in the FITS keywords) Default: [] (i.e.take from FITS file)
Example: beam=['0.35arcsec', '0.24arcsec', '25deg']
